content: "Specific agreements among these institutions facilitate the implementation\
  \ of mobility actions. A significant outcome combining teaching and innovative,\
  \ high-level research is the launch of a joint PhD program in Agro-Food Sciences,\
  \ Technologies, and Biotechnologies starting from the academic year 2024-2025. This\
  \ PhD program will award the degree from five universities (University of Modena\
  \ and Reggio Emilia, Almer\xEDa, Coimbra, Plovdiv, and Iceland). Additionally, joint\
  \ programs for awarding dual or multiple degrees are being planned, which will further\
  \ open up international opportunities through first and second-level educational\
  \ paths. These programs will include lectures and seminars in shared virtual classrooms\
  \ among the Alliance universities, participation in Summer Schools, Blended Intensive\
  \ Programs (BIPs), and other educational activities that will occur both in-person\
  \ and remotely in a lifelong learning context."
